<font color=red>Why Course Builder?</font>
  * *Course template:* Take our sample course and make it your own.
  * *Platform:* Launch your course online using Google App Engine.
  * *Forum:* Start a course community with Google Groups.
  * *Evaluation:* Evaluate your course's efficacy with Google Analytics and Google Forms.
  * *Share your experiences:* Hangout with Google and your fellow educators to exchange ideas.
